content.question: Which of the following is the most important way to calm an adult showing distress? (Select only one)

answers.option: Ignore their emotional state and focus only on tasks.
Encourage slow, deep breathing and provide reassurance calmly.
Force them to stop shaking or crying immediately.
Listen actively without judgment and acknowledge feelings.

content.correct: Correct! Encouraging slow, deep breathing and calm reassurance is the most important step.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answer is: Encourage slow, deep breathing and provide reassurance calmly.
